sentence.Network_en: They were unsteady on their feet and rather uncoordinated.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们站立不稳，协调性较差。

sentence.Network_en: His voice was unsteady and only just audible.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的声音发颤，而且小得只刚刚能听见。

sentence.Network_en: She is still a little unsteady on her feet after the operation.
sentence.Network_cn: 手术以后她还有点站不稳。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... unsteadily ad. 不稳定地 unsteady a. 不稳定的 icy a. 冰冷的， 盖着冰的； 冷淡的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unsteadiness 不稳定 unsteady 不安定的 unstick 扯开.
与非定常((unsteady)两大类。当流动的物理量不随时间变化，即时，为定常流动;当计算流体动力学分析-CFD软件原理与应用_王福军 …
颤字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 颤栗〖 shudder〗 颤巍巍〖 unsteady;tottering;faltering〗 颤悠〖 flicker〗.

list.abs: ... 另外,像洪水这样的水流,水深和流速不但随时间的变化而变化,而且和位置的不同流速也有不同,这种水流被称为不稳定流,unsteady flow,   参考资料1．张鸿雁，张志远，王元．流体力学．.
若流动的流体中,任一点上的物理参数,有部分或全部随时间而改变,这种流动称为不稳定流动(unsteady flow)。例如水自变动水位的贮水槽中经小孔流出,则水的流出速度.
unstable equilibrium 不稳定平�unsteady state 非稳定态untreated oil 未处理油料
unsteady flow 不稳定流动unsteady motion 不稳定运动unsteady 不稳定的
unstable resonator 不稳定谐振器unsteady system 不稳定系统unsupported ribbon growth 无支护带式晶体生长.

entry.tran: 脚步不稳的；身体摇晃的
entry.def: If you are unsteady, you have difficulty doing something, for example walking, because you cannot completely control your legs or your body.

example.ex: The boy was very unsteady and had staggered around when he got up...
example.tran: 男孩站立不稳，并且起身后四下走动时步子踉跄。

example.ex: He poured coffee into the mugs, and with an unsteady hand, held one of them out to David.
example.tran: 他把咖啡倒进杯里，然后一只手颤巍巍地端了一杯给戴维。

entry.tran: 不稳定的；不可靠的；无法捉摸的；变幻无常的
entry.def: If you describe something as unsteady, you mean that it is not regular or stable, but unreliable or unpredictable.

example.ex: His voice was unsteady and only just audible...
example.tran: 他的声音发颤，而且小得只刚刚能听见。

example.ex: She knew first-hand the impact an unsteady parent could have on a sensitive young girl.
example.tran: 她有亲身体验，知道情绪变化无常的家长对一个敏感的小女孩会产生什么影响。

entry.tran: 不牢固的；不稳固的；不结实的
entry.def: Unsteady objects are not held, fixed, or balanced securely.

example.tran: 一件稍微有些不结实的家具

means.word_mean: 1. subject to change or variation especially in behavior;

sentences.sentence: "his hand was unsteady as he poured the wine"

auth_sentence.content: Their raft was far too unsteady for standing on.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their raft was far too unsteady for standing on.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their raft was far too unsteady for standing on.

auth_sentence.content: They were too unsteady to trust each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were too unsteady to trust each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were too unsteady to trust each other.

auth_sentence.content: The sportsman of unsteady nerve...is apt to undershoot.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sportsman of unsteady nerve...is apt to undershoot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sportsman of unsteady nerve...is apt to undershoot.

Sentence.sentence: As the brain attempts to force the unsteady hand to do its bidding, the tension between the two results in a more compressed, psychologically denser expression.

means.word_mean: 不坚固的,不牢靠的,不稳的

sentences.en: the unsteady light of a candle
He’s a bit unsteady on his pins.
sentences.cn: 他的两腿还有点站不稳。
